Comment: Abilities: A0PD (Water Images), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Creates water images of Azshara to fight enemies and dispels all magic from her.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Creates 2 images which deal 50% the damage of  Azshara and take 250% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Creates 4 images which deal 50% the damage of Azshara and take 225% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Creates 6 images which deal 50% the damage of Azshara and take 200% the damage.  |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Creates 8 images which deal 50% the damage of Azshara and take 150% the damage.
